[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@imhonglu/format](./format.md) &gt; [FullTime](./format.fulltime.md)

## FullTime class

The FullTime formatter based on RFC 3339.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FullTime 
```

## Example


```ts
FullTime.parse("12:34:56Z");
// { hour: 12, minute: 34, second: 56, offset: undefined }
```
